*&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form Set_Default_object_size *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* * text *----------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM set_default_object_size CHANGING p_size TYPE ygpl_dba_table_size o_obj_size TYPE ygpl_dba_interfaces=>ti_object_size. DATA d_size TYPE ygplidba_tables_size=>td_size. IF o_obj_size IS NOT BOUND. o_obj_size = ygpl_dba_factories=>get_object_size( ). ENDIF.
d_size = o_obj_size->db_size / 1024. " DB Size (ko) => (Mo) d_size = d_size / 1000. " 0,1% of db_size p_size = d_size * 1000. " 3 decimals ENDFORM. "Set_Default_object_size
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form CREATE_LIST *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM create_list USING r_srcs TYPE ygpl_tadir_search=>tr_srcsystem r_soft TYPE ygpl_tadir_search=>tr_softcomp r_name TYPE ygpl_tadir_search=>tr_compname r_pack TYPE ygpl_tadir_search=>tr_packages r_author TYPE ygpl_tadir_search=>tr_author p_ext TYPE abap_bool p_size TYPE ygpl_dba_table_size CHANGING o_list TYPE ygpl_dba_interfaces=>ti_table_list.
DATA d_table_size TYPE ygpl_dba_typespool=>td_size. DATA s_search_crit TYPE ygplidba_table_list=>s_tadir_search.
d_table_size = p_size * 1024. " Mo => Ko o_list = ygpl_dba_factories=>create_table_list( ). o_list->set_lower_size_limit( d_table_size ). s_search_crit-r_srcs = r_srcs. s_search_crit-r_soft = r_soft. s_search_crit-r_name = r_name. s_search_crit-r_pack = r_pack. s_search_crit-r_author = r_author. s_search_crit-p_ext = p_ext. o_list->search_add_components( s_search_crit ). ENDFORM. " CREATE_LIST
